resources.string:
Race down the highway right 
on your phone. Avoid 
accident with other cars 
and collect points. Move 
from lane to lane in this 
highway car racing game 
to go faster. You can also 
boost your car to run faster 
on the highway race and get 
more points. Highest points 
collected will be shown on 
scoreboard.



How to play ::
> Tilt your phone to control the car.
> The more distance you cover the more points you get.
> Collect the bonus stars to score more.
> Press the boost to run on super speed. But beware of other cars.
> Racing in super speed gets you more points.

> MD. TOUFIQUE HASAN
	 CSE, AUST

	> FAHIM ARMAN
	 CSE, AUST
